website_summaries.verdict: The AOC e2752Vh is a budget-friendly 27-inch monitor with a fast pixel response and a better-than-average pair of speakers. While features are scarce, and the panel has trouble displaying dark shades of gray, its color accuracy is good for the price.

customer_reviews.title: So happy with these monitors.
customer_reviews.text: Have 3 of the exact same monitors. Can't tell which one is 2 years old, which one is a few months and which one is brand new. All have been running almost non stop since I set them up. Since I don't use the monitor speakers, no big deal for me, but I tried them once and they suck. But the monitor being a monitor is great and the DVI, HDMI, and VGA options make these easy to set up whatever cords you have to setup. They also have the 4 hole mounting back so I switched from the stands to mounting all 3.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey E. Loose

customer_reviews.title: I like this monitor
customer_reviews.text: I like this monitor. It's a good bang for the buck. Like some in it's class, if you hit the wrong button, your input changes. To the novice user this means shutting everything off, unplugging everything and powering everything back on. With that said, I love the color on this monitor, and the resolution nice and crisp. If I nitpick, the stand leave a lot to be desired as I found the installation to be unnecessarily hard. Other manufacturers have this line up and click pedestal installation, which I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Gregory J. Gresh

customer_reviews.title: Good Monitor - Beware of Dead/Stuck Pixels
customer_reviews.text: Good monitor for the price, but has stuck pixels. I purchased several of these monitors, and every single one of them has at least 1-3 faulty pixels on them that are stuck in either a blue, green, or red pixel. Tried tons of different software to fix the issue, and none have corrected it. Also tried "massaging" the screen in the area that had the issue to no avail either. Overall the monitor is great, just unfortunate that they couldn't fix the pixel issue.
customer_reviews.author: Nick W.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic monitors!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm the head of IT for a global business. I purchased these monitors for our marketing staff on their request. I thought it was odd they didnt want dell or other name brand monitors. Finally at a meeting last week I got to see these things. They are incredible. They look great, are really bright and super sharp. Would definitely recommend these to anyone and will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: MikeGainesville

customer_reviews.title: So Far I Love It
customer_reviews.text: I'm not a big person on monitors and setting them up to suit a particular taste. All I know is it shows a nice image. I got it so I could use it with my flight simulator. It was the biggest screen I could get for the money I had, but I am very satisfied with it. I've had a 19" AOC monitor for years with no problems from it what so ever ... so far it has been the same with this model, even though I've only had it for several months.
customer_reviews.author: spirittoo

customer_reviews.title: Bought to Replace Smaller Dual Monitors
customer_reviews.text: I have used dual monitors since 1995. I am so spoiled with having two monitors. I have upgraded two or three times since, the latest was from dual 21-inch monitors to two of these 27-inch monitors. The biggest bonus (among many) is that I put all my PhotoShop tools onto the second monitor which leaves the whole of the first monitor for the graphic at hand. I don't have one iota of regret for being spoiled.
customer_reviews.author: Plankwing

customer_reviews.title: A great budget monitor
customer_reviews.text: This has been a great monitor. I like the vivid colors and wide viewing angles. On a lot of monitors, you have to be right in a very small sweet spot to see the images clearly. The AOC does not have that problem. I also like the downloadable software for adjusting the monitor via software. Making adjustments via the tiny buttons on the front of most monitors is difficult and not intuitive.
customer_reviews.author: silvermaned bob

customer_reviews.title: Love this monitor
customer_reviews.text: Love this monitor. Full HD 1080P is totally amazing! I was going to order the Ben Q but changed my mind because of one of the reviews. I decided to go with this one because of one of the reviews I've read that was helpful. I will be using this for my video editing projects which require color correction. So far the colors are amazing. I haven't even got into video editing yet.
customer_reviews.author: yoyo

customer_reviews.title: Excellent monitor for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Three years later, still going strong. $66 cheaper today than when I purchased it. Resolution is 'true HD' - 1920x1080, which SOUNDS good - but since you can get that on 22" and 24" monitors, all it means is things look a little bigger on this screen. There are other 27" monitors out there that offer 2560x1440, which gives you more 'real estate' on the same size screen. But for the $267 I paid for this in 2012, an excellent purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Armorham

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor for the price
customer_reviews.text: I just needed a large basic monitor for my old eyes. I do not do gaming requiring the bells and whistles of the high end monitors. This one has very good resolution and so far works great. I love the size. I can display two documents side by side with no problem. better then using two small monitors.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Geat Monitor for the Money

Big display, good colors, and no dead pixels. And Win7 recognizes it and loads the proper driver for it. Not that that is necessary, but it is kind of nice.

customer_reviews.title: Really Nice

Word of Advice is to get one if you want a big monitor to watch your movies and do your browsing. I have a projector to watch my movies but when i'm feeling like not using the projector this monitor will and does work just right...

customer_reviews.title: Defective out of the box

customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Great Monitor Full HD
customer_reviews.text: Product was delivered as described. No issues with the monitor. It is full 1080p. The monitor is slightly adjustable with an up and downward tilt and the buttons are clearly marked unlike how others are describing it. The only con is the speakers are not of great sound quality but they will work in a pinch if you have no other options. The software that comes with the monitor is better downloaded from AOCs website and the drivers are better updated with windows as Microsoft seems to have the most updated version of the driver. The Screen+ feature is great but does not work with all applications, however it is not a necessary feature. Awesome product for a great price.
customer_reviews.author: Don Brown

customer_reviews.title: Great monitor if you are looking for a 27"

product_meta.title: AOC E2752VH 27-Inch Widescreen LED Monitor - Black
product_meta.description:
The e2752Vh monitor displays 16.7 million colors and offers a 2ms response time. Perfect for fast action sequences while gaming or watching action films. The ultra-high 20,000,000:1 contrast ratio reveals more depth and detail in darker scenes, while built-in speakers provide improved desktop sound.

AMAZON.COM


AOC E2752VH 27-INCH CLASS SLIM 2MS LED MONITOR
27" CLASS LED-BACKLIT MONITOR WITH THE FAST RESPONSE TIME AND MULTIMEDIA CONNECTIVITY YOU NEED
The e2752Vh is a 27" widescreen LED monitor that delivers stunningly crisp and impressive image quality, as well as solid performance with a two millisecond response time. Ideal for multimedia applications, the energy efficient display also features two built-in 2.5 watt speakers for SRS-quality sound and is perfectly suited for PC gaming and Home Theater environments. 




Direct-insert feature allows cables to be connected horizontally with ease. View larger. KEY FEATURES
 * Screen+ software to split display into four self-contained work areas
 * Direct-Insert horizontal connectors for ease of connecting your cables
 * Built-in speakers for improved desktop sound
 * 2ms (GTG) response time for smooth motion playback
 * Multimedia connectivity with VGA, HDMI, DVI-D
 * VESA 100mm wallmount compliant

ATTRACTIVE SLIM AND USER-FRIENDLY DESIGN
The e2752Vh is designed with a glossy black bezel and base. The monitor is able to display 16.7 million colors and offers a 2ms response time that provides crisp, clear images even in fast action sequences while gaming or watching action films. The ultra-high dynamic contrast ratio of 20,000,000:1 reveals more depth and detail in darker scenes, while built-in speakers provide improved desktop sound. The versatile monitor is VESA 100mm wall mount compliant, meaning that it can be used on a desktop or conveniently mounted on the wall to save space. The monitor's slim and streamlined appearance is complemented by ergonomic, user-friendly design.

Screen+ software splits your display into four self-contained work areas for improved productivity. FEATURES YOU WILL APPRECIATE
The monitor settings can be adjusted via the on-screen menu system, which is available in 14 languages including English, French and Spanish. The iMenu option also allows the user to change settings using only the keyboard and mouse, so that it is not necessary to reach up to the screen to adjust contrast, brightness and other preset modes. 

Other bonus features include embedded Screen+ software that divides the screen into four self-contained work areas for improved productivity, and an Off Timer that sets an alarm clock to turn off the monitor automatically. The e2752Vh comes with VGA, DVI-D and HDMI with HDCP for easy connectivity and features easily accessible digital and power connections that are rear-facing for direct insertion, a placement that is much more convenient than the more common downward-pointing ports.

A MONITOR THAT IS ECO-FRIENDLY 
Along with delivering strong performance, image quality and bonus features, the ENERGY STAR compliant e2752Vh also reduces energy costs and environmental impact. The display's LED backlight is completely free of toxic Mercury, and the monitor also includes an eSaver feature that lets the user preset power conservation modes for the display when the PC is not in use. The monitor's Power Saving Mode uses 50 percent less power, and Standby Mode uses only 0.1w.

TECH SPECIFICATIONS
 * Viewable Image Size: 27"
 * Aspect Ratio: 16:9
 * Panel: LED Backlit - TFT-LCD Panel
 * Brightness: 300 cd/m2
 * Contrast Ratio: 20,000,000:1
 * Response Time: 2ms
 * View Angle: 170 degrees horizontal, 160 degrees vertical
 * Optimum Resolution: 1920 x 1080 @ 60Hz
 * Colors Supported: 16.7 Million 
 * Connectivity: VGA, HDMI, DVI-D with HDCP
 * Windows 8 Compatible: Yes
